caption.p: Long-term cycling performance of the ( a) pristine and ( b) pre-lithiated CNT anodes; galvanostatic charge–discharge curves of the ( c) pristine CNT, ( d) SPAPE-coated CNT, ( e) pre-lithiated pristine CNT and ( f) pre-lithiated SPAPE-coated CNT in the potential window of 0.01–2 V at a constant current density of 1.2 mA cm −2.
